snippet: A man killed himself with a sawed-off shotgun in front of about a dozen children, according to preliminary police reports.
lead_paragraph: A man killed himself with a sawed-off shotgun in front of about a dozen children, according to preliminary police reports.

headline.seo: Intruder Commits Suicide at Paris School
